document_data.mainbody:
oris Ballast was a guest of Nortales Hostel in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Goris was a dark-skinned and clean-shaven gold dwarf man with navy-blue eyes, bulbous nose, and curly black hair.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, and the city of Baldurs Gate being flooded with refugees, Goris Ballast was among the guests of Nortales Hostel that offered lodgings to refugees. The dwarfs bunk was located in the hostels second floor, however ht complained about the boisterous and loud neighbors, yet he appreciated the places safety.
